body_html:
@andrewharp so if I build the APK 4 times after changing the cpu type, all of them will get packaged because the binaries (or whatever) accumulate in the Libs folder etc? Because if so then looping gradle automatically might not be too tricky for me to have a stab at.

Re: cmake. Ok. I was hoping I could get it working on Windows with make. I feel like I hit some errors before. Might give it another go now i'm more clued up. Thanks
